about_the_game:
Super Laser Racer is an exciting combat racing game set in outer geometric space. Blast your way to the top of the leaderboards using lasers, missiles, bombs and more! 24 exhilarating tracks, 12 racers, 8 challenging tournaments, online multi-player and a track editor.

  • 24 exhilirating tracks
  • 12 racers to unlock
  • 8 challenging tournaments
  • Bombs, cannons, lasers, mines, missiles, plasmas!
  • Online leaderboards
  • Eliminator and Survival race modes
  • Create your own tracks
detailed_description:
Super Laser Racer is an exciting combat racing game set in outer geometric space. Blast your way to the top of the leaderboards using lasers, missiles, bombs and more! 24 exhilarating tracks, 12 racers, 8 challenging tournaments, online multi-player and a track editor.

  • 12 racers to unlock

  • Bombs, cannons, lasers, mines, missiles, plasmas!
  • Online leaderboards

name: Super Laser Racer Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows 7/XP/Vista
  • Processor: 1Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 256MB or higher
  • Hard Drive: 40MB of free space
  • Graphics: OpenGL capable
  • Sound: OpenAL

short_description: Super Laser Racer is an exciting combat racing game set in outer geometric space. Blast your way to the top of the leaderboards using lasers, missiles, bombs and more! 24 exhilarating tracks, 12 racers, 8 challenging tournaments, online multi-player and a track editor.
supported_languages: Dutch, English, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Spain
